name: J'zargo's Experiment

objectives.text: Hear J'zargo's proposal (and his extremely confident risk assessment).
Test the scrolls in a controlled (ha) environment or hostile ruin.

gm_notes: Perfect for compels and collateral aspects. If you want Saarthal to feel dangerous early, this quest can 'preload' that tone.
